alert.note: Alert for Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 2:52PM MST until July 17 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... Western Santa Cruz County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 345 PM MST. * At 251 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Tubac to 7 miles south of Arivaca, moving northwest at 15 to 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tubac, Three Points, Arivaca, Amado, Sasabe, Pena Blanca Lake, Arivaca Lake, Ruby and Arivaca Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
